Title: Web Control for DPWS Discovery and Streaming from Prototype Windows CE IP Camera
HomeWiki:
NOTE: Project requires an IP Camera that implements WSD on the same subnet.

Project Description
This project consists of a Web Control (ActiveX) that provides 2 main functions;

1) Automatic Discovery using DPWS / WSD to detect Prototype Windows CE IP Network cam on the subnet.

2) JPEG video streaming from device using discovery infomation to setup stream (DirectX).
